interaction.title: Composing maps
interaction.content: Choose tools, viewer options, layers groups, priorities and interactions.

interaction.title: Inspect values in real-time
interaction.content: Get any cell value or a region's total value in real-time.

interaction.title: Simulate scenarios
interaction.content: Run simulations from selected input maps.

interaction.title: Filter map to specific values ranges
interaction.content: Dynamically limit the range of map values.

interaction.title: Show transitions
interaction.content: Select a transition between two maps and show that specific transition on the map.

database.title: CSR DATABASE
database.content: All maps publicly available; all maps include comprehensive metadata.

database.title: DISPLAY YOUR MAPS
database.content: Easily configure a server to display your maps on CSR Maps or on a GIS software.

database.title: DATA SOURCES
database.content: Use others data sources in your project: CSV, JSON or cloud storage services.

license.title: EDUCATIONAL
license.content: Completely free for any educational purpose.

license.title: PROFITABLE
license.content: Free for any commercial use except the highcharts library. This library has a limitation in href="https://www.highcharts.com/">highchart license, please contact them directly.

license.title: RESEARCH
license.content: Feel free to display any research project results using the CSR Maps Database.

license.title: DOCUMENTATION
license.content: View complete documentation with use cases.
